statements: SELECT * FROM survey_responses
SELECT response_id, survey_id, respondent_id, question_id, answer_text, answer_date FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_id = 1
SELECT respondent_id, answer_text FROM survey_responses WHERE question_id = 3 ORDER BY answer_date DESC
SELECT survey_id, COUNT(response_id) FROM survey_responses GROUP BY survey_id
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE respondent_id = 5 AND answer_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_id = 1 ORDER BY answer_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT respondent_id, COUNT(response_id) AS response_count FROM survey_responses GROUP BY respondent_id ORDER BY response_count DESC
SELECT DISTINCT question_id FROM survey_responses WHERE respondent_id = 3
SELECT response_id, survey_id, answer_text FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT respondent_id, MAX(answer_date) AS latest_response_date FROM survey_responses GROUP BY respondent_id
SELECT id, question_id, user_id, response, response_date FROM survey_responses WHERE question_id = 1
SELECT question_id, total_responses, max_response_length FROM survey_summary ORDER BY total_responses DESC
SELECT response, response_date FROM survey_responses WHERE user_id = 10
SELECT * FROM survey_responses ORDER BY response_date DESC
SELECT AVG(average_response_length) FROM survey_summary WHERE question_id = 2
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE id = 1;
SELECT question_id, COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM survey_responses GROUP BY question_id;
SELECT response, SUM(LENGTH(response)) AS total_length FROM survey_responses WHERE question_id = 2 GROUP BY response;
SELECT user_id, response_date FROM survey_responses WHERE response_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY response_date DESC;

SELECT s.question_id, s.total_responses, s.average_response_length, s.max_response_length, s.min_response_length, r.response FROM survey_summary s JOIN survey_responses r ON s.question_id = r.question_id WHERE r.user_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses;
SELECT question_id, answer FROM SurveyResponses WHERE survey_id = 'a1b2c3';
SELECT trend_type, survey_id FROM SurveyAnalytics WHERE question_id = 123 ORDER BY trend_id DESC;
SELECT survey_id, COUNT(response_id) AS total_responses FROM SurveyResponses GROUP BY survey_id;
SELECT question_text FROM SurveyQuestions WHERE question_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE survey_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT response_id, question_id, answer FROM SurveyResponses WHERE question_id = 5;
SELECT s.question_text, r.answer FROM SurveyQuestions s JOIN SurveyResponses r ON s.question_id = r.question_id;
SELECT s.question_text, a.trend_type FROM SurveyQuestions s JOIN SurveyAnalytics a ON s.question_id = a.question_id WHERE a.trend_type = 'positive';
SELECT r.response_id, s.question_text, a.trend_type FROM SurveyResponses r JOIN SurveyQuestions s ON r.question_id = s.question_id JOIN SurveyAnalytics a ON r.question_id = a.question_id;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses;
SELECT question_id, response_text FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM survey_participants WHERE participant_id = 2;
SELECT survey_id, COUNT(response_id) AS total_responses FROM survey_results GROUP BY survey_id;
SELECT response_id, response_text FROM survey_responses ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE response_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT response_text, response_date FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_id = 1 ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM survey_participants WHERE participant_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT question_text, question_type FROM survey_questions WHERE question_type = 'Multiple Choice';

SELECT sr.result_id, sp.participant_name, sq.question_text, sr.response_id FROM survey_results sr JOIN survey_participants sp ON sr.participant_id = sp.participant_id JOIN survey_questions sq ON sr.question_id = sq.question_id ORDER BY sr.result_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT username, age, gender FROM users WHERE gender = 'female';
SELECT question_text FROM questions WHERE question_id = 3;
SELECT result_id, score FROM survey_results ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT user_id, AVG(age) AS average_age FROM users GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC;

SELECT survey_responses.response_id, survey_responses.answer, questions.question_text FROM survey_responses JOIN questions ON survey_responses.question_id = questions.question_id WHERE survey_responses.user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as response_count FROM survey_responses GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT user_id, MAX(age) as max_age, MIN(age) as min_age FROM users GROUP BY user_id;

SELECT analysis_results.analysis_name, survey_results.result_id, survey_results.score FROM analysis_results JOIN survey_results ON analysis_results.result_id = survey_results.result_id ORDER BY survey_results.score DESC;
